title: Mechanical Behavior of Materials 4th Edition c2013 Dowling txtbk
description:
Mechanical Behavior of Materials: Engineering Methods for Deformation, Fracture, and Fatigue, 4th Edition (c2013), textbook by Norman E. Dowling.

TEXTBOOK INFO
Int'l: <a href=" http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/educator/product/9780273764557.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/educator/product/9780273764557.page</a>
Nat'l: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780131395060.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780131395060.page</a>

COURSES: Upper-level undergraduate (and grad) engineering courses in Mechanical
         Behavior of Materials (Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering)

NOTE: Apparently, some slight differences exist between the national and the
      international editions.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. Introduction
2. Structure and Deformation in Materials
3. A Survey of Engineering Materials
4. Mechanical Testing: Tension Test and Other Basic Tests
5. Stress-Strain Relationships and Behavior
6. Review of Complex and Principal States of Stress and Strain
7. Yielding and Fracture under Combined Stresses
8. Fracture of Cracked Members
9. Fatigue of Materials: Introduction and Stress-Based Approach
10. Stress-Based Approach to Fatigue: Notched Members
11. Fatigue Crack Growth
12. Plastic Deformation Behavior and Models for Materials
13. Stress-Strain Analysis of Plastically Deforming Members
14. Strain-Based Approach to Fatigue
15. Time-Dependent Behavior: Creep and Damping
APPENDICES:
 A: Review of Selected Topics from Mechanics of Materials
 B: Statistical Variation in Materials Properties

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, quasi-true PDF. Compressed (zipped): *right-
           click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard
           the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.


solutions ISM 3rd edition c2007:
-------------------------------
2 problems out of 3 in the 4th edition come from the 3rd edition... Problem statements not included in the ISM so problem identification is done by inspection. ISM available on torrent:
